name: RealtyRegistry
description: A registry for Realty. The contract is owned by an EOA who is considered the super owner using openzeppellin's Ownable.sol. This contract is used to register and transfer Realty from owners.

eventDecorators.name: FundsDeposited
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. trigger notification of withdrawal.

eventDecorators.name: FundsWithdrawn
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. trigger notification of withdrawal.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. trigger notification of withdrawal.

eventDecorators.name: Paused
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. trigger notification of withdrawal.

eventDecorators.name: RealtyPriceUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. trigger notification of withdrawal.

eventDecorators.name: RealtyPurchased
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. trigger notification of withdrawal.

eventDecorators.name: RealtyStateChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. trigger notification of withdrawal.

eventDecorators.name: RealtyTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. trigger notification of withdrawal.

eventDecorators.name: RegistrationAdded
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. trigger notification of withdrawal.

eventDecorators.name: RegistrationRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. trigger notification of withdrawal.

eventDecorators.name: Unpaused
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. trigger notification of withdrawal.

functionDecorators.name: changeAvailability
functionDecorators.description: Privileged function which allows the Realty owner to change the availability of the listing. The RealtyState is automatically toggled to available or not available depending on previous state.

parameterDecorators.name: registryId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the Realty to change.

functionDecorators.name: changePrice
functionDecorators.description: Privileged function which allows the Realty owner to change the listing price.

parameterDecorators.name: registryId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the Realty to change.

parameterDecorators.name: price
parameterDecorators.description: The new price to set the Realty to.

functionDecorators.name: deregister
functionDecorators.description: A function only used by the registry owner to deregister an existing Realty.

parameterDecorators.name: registryId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the Realty to deregister.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: purchaseRegistration
functionDecorators.description: Function used by a purchaser to purchase an available Realty. Function is payable.

parameterDecorators.name: registryId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the Realty to purchase.

functionDecorators.name: register
functionDecorators.description: A function only used by the registry owner to register a new Realty. The registryId is automatically generated by the currentID state variable.

parameterDecorators.name: streetName
parameterDecorators.description: The street name of the Realty.

parameterDecorators.name: postCode
parameterDecorators.description: The post code/zip code of the Realty.

parameterDecorators.name: city
parameterDecorators.description: The city the Realty is located in.

parameterDecorators.name: country
parameterDecorators.description: The country the Realty is located in.

parameterDecorators.name: price
parameterDecorators.description: The initial value of the Realty.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: The initial owner of the Realty on registration.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFunds
functionDecorators.description: Function which allows a user to withdraw any fund that are escrowed in the contract.
